definitions.description: The carbon footprint of a product and related data in accordance with the Pathfinder Framework.

constantValues: The carbon footprint of a product and related data in accordance with the Pathfinder Framework.

members.name: sustainabilityproductcarbonfootprintId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: statecode
members.description: Status of the (Preview) Sustainability product carbon footprint

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statecode_display' is added to the 'PreviewSustainabilityProductCarbonFootprint' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statecode'
supportingAttribute.name: statecode_display

constantValues: Status of the (Preview) Sustainability product carbon footprint

members.name: statuscode
members.description: Reason for the status of the (Preview) Sustainability product carbon footprint

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statuscode_display' is added to the 'PreviewSustainabilityProductCarbonFootprint' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statuscode'
supportingAttribute.name: statuscode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the (Preview) Sustainability product carbon footprint

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the custom entity.

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: aircraftghgemissions
members.description: The GHG emissions resulting from aircraft engine usage for the transport of the product. Must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit and non-negative.

constantValues: The GHG emissions resulting from aircraft engine usage for the transport of the product. Must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit and non-negative.

members.name: allocationrulesdescription
members.description: If present, a description of any allocation rules applied and the rationale explaining how the selected approach aligns with Pathfinder Framework rules.

constantValues: If present, a description of any allocation rules applied and the rationale explaining how the selected approach aligns with Pathfinder Framework rules.

members.name: biogenicaccountingmethodology
members.description: The standard followed to account for biogenic emissions and removals.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'biogenicaccountingmethodology_display' is added to the 'PreviewSustainabilityProductCarbonFootprint' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'biogenicaccountingmethodology'
supportingAttribute.name: biogenicaccountingmethodology_display

constantValues: The standard followed to account for biogenic emissions and removals.

members.name: biogeniccarboncontent
members.description: The biogenic carbon amount embodied in the product. The value must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit, expressed as a decimal equal to or greater than zero.

constantValues: The biogenic carbon amount embodied in the product. The value must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit, expressed as a decimal equal to or greater than zero.

members.name: biogeniccarbonwithdrawal
members.description: If present, the biogenic carbon content in the product converted to CO2e. The value must be calculated per declared unit with unit kg expressed as a decimal equal to or greater than zero.

constantValues: If present, the biogenic carbon content in the product converted to CO2e. The value must be calculated per declared unit with unit kg expressed as a decimal equal to or greater than zero.

members.name: boundaryprocessesdescription
members.description: If present, the processes attributable to each lifecycle stage. If no such description is available or otherwise provided, then this field must be empty.

constantValues: If present, the processes attributable to each lifecycle stage. If no such description is available or otherwise provided, then this field must be empty.

members.name: characterizationfactors
members.description: The IPCC Assessment Report used in the calculation of the PCF.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'characterizationfactors_display' is added to the 'PreviewSustainabilityProductCarbonFootprint' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'characterizationfactors'
supportingAttribute.name: characterizationfactors_display

constantValues: The IPCC Assessment Report used in the calculation of the PCF.

members.name: completenessdqr
members.description: DQR based on data quality matrix, scoring completeness of data collected for PCF from weighted average of all inputs >5% of PCF emissions. Must be from 1 to 3, inclusive.

constantValues: DQR based on data quality matrix, scoring completeness of data collected for PCF from weighted average of all inputs >5% of PCF emissions. Must be from 1 to 3, inclusive.

members.name: coveragepercent
members.description: Percentage of PCF included in the data quality assessment based on the >5% emissions threshold.

constantValues: Percentage of PCF included in the data quality assessment based on the >5% emissions threshold.

members.name: crosssectoralstandardsused1
members.description: The cross-sectoral standards applied for calculating or allocating GHG emissions.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'crosssectoralstandardsused1_display' is added to the 'PreviewSustainabilityProductCarbonFootprint' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'crosssectoralstandardsused1'
supportingAttribute.name: crosssectoralstandardsused1_display

constantValues: The cross-sectoral standards applied for calculating or allocating GHG emissions.

members.name: crosssectoralstandardsused2
members.description: The cross-sectoral standards applied for calculating or allocating GHG emissions.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'crosssectoralstandardsused2_display' is added to the 'PreviewSustainabilityProductCarbonFootprint' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'crosssectoralstandardsused2'
supportingAttribute.name: crosssectoralstandardsused2_display

constantValues: The cross-sectoral standards applied for calculating or allocating GHG emissions.

members.name: crosssectoralstandardsused3
members.description: The cross-sectoral standards applied for calculating or allocating GHG emissions.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'crosssectoralstandardsused3_display' is added to the 'PreviewSustainabilityProductCarbonFootprint' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'crosssectoralstandardsused3'
supportingAttribute.name: crosssectoralstandardsused3_display

constantValues: The cross-sectoral standards applied for calculating or allocating GHG emissions.

members.name: declaredunit
members.description: The unit of analysis of the product.

constantValues: The unit of analysis of the product.

members.name: dlucghgemissions
members.description: Emissions from recent carbon stock loss from land conversion on land in consideration. Must include dLUC if available, else sLUC can be used. Unit kgCO2e per declared unit and must be >= 0.

constantValues: Emissions from recent carbon stock loss from land conversion on land in consideration. Must include dLUC if available, else sLUC can be used. Unit kgCO2e per declared unit and must be >= 0.

members.name: exemptedemissionsdescription
members.description: Rationale behind exclusion of specific PCF emissions, can have no data if no emissions were excluded.

constantValues: Rationale behind exclusion of specific PCF emissions, can have no data if no emissions were excluded.

members.name: exemptedemissionspercent
members.description: The percentage of emissions excluded from PCF, expressed as a decimal number from 0.0 to 5, inclusive.

constantValues: The percentage of emissions excluded from PCF, expressed as a decimal number from 0.0 to 5, inclusive.

members.name: fossilcarboncontent
members.description: The fossil carbon amount embodied in the product. The value must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit, expressed as a decimal equal to or greater than zero.

constantValues: The fossil carbon amount embodied in the product. The value must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit, expressed as a decimal equal to or greater than zero.

members.name: fossilghgemissions
members.description: The emissions from the combustion of fossil sources. The value must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit, expressed as a decimal equal to or greater than zero.

constantValues: The emissions from the combustion of fossil sources. The value must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit, expressed as a decimal equal to or greater than zero.

members.name: geographicaldqr
members.description: DQR based on data quality matrix, scoring geographical representativeness of sources used for PCF from weighted average of all inputs >5% of PCF emissions. Must be from 1 to 3, inclusive.

constantValues: DQR based on data quality matrix, scoring geographical representativeness of sources used for PCF from weighted average of all inputs >5% of PCF emissions. Must be from 1 to 3, inclusive.

members.name: geographycountry
members.description: If present, the value must conform to an ISO 3166-2 alpha-2 code.

constantValues: If present, the value must conform to an ISO 3166-2 alpha-2 code.

members.name: geographycountrysubdivision
members.description: If present, an ISO 3166-2 subdivision code.

constantValues: If present, an ISO 3166-2 subdivision code.

members.name: geographyregionorsubregion
members.description: If present, the value must conform to data type RegionOrSubregion, as specified by the Pathfinder Framework.

constantValues: If present, the value must conform to data type RegionOrSubregion, as specified by the Pathfinder Framework.

members.name: ilucghgemissions
members.description: Emissions from recent carbon stock loss from land conversion on land outside control of company or its supply chain, induced by demand change. Unit kgCO2e per declared unit and must be >= 0.

constantValues: Emissions from recent carbon stock loss from land conversion on land outside control of company or its supply chain, induced by demand change. Unit kgCO2e per declared unit and must be >= 0.

members.name: landmanagementghgemissions
members.description: GHG emissions and removals associated with land management-related changes, including non-CO2 sources. Must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit and non-negative.

constantValues: GHG emissions and removals associated with land management-related changes, including non-CO2 sources. Must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit and non-negative.

members.name: otherbiogenicghgemissions
members.description: All other biogenic GHG emissions associated with product manufacturing and transport that are not included in dLUC, iLUC, and land management. Unit kgCO2e per declared unit and must be >= 0.

constantValues: All other biogenic GHG emissions associated with product manufacturing and transport that are not included in dLUC, iLUC, and land management. Unit kgCO2e per declared unit and must be >= 0.

members.name: packagingemissionsincluded
members.description: A boolean flag indicating whether packaging emissions are included in the PCF.

constantValues: A boolean flag indicating whether packaging emissions are included in the PCF.

members.name: packagingghgemissions
members.description: Emissions from the packaging of the product. Must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit and non-negative. The field must be empty if packaging emissions included is false.

constantValues: Emissions from the packaging of the product. Must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit and non-negative. The field must be empty if packaging emissions included is false.

members.name: pcfexcludingbiogenic
members.description: The PCF of the product excluding biogenic emissions. The value must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit, expressed as a decimal equal to or greater than zero.

constantValues: The PCF of the product excluding biogenic emissions. The value must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit, expressed as a decimal equal to or greater than zero.

members.name: pcfincludingbiogenic
members.description: The PCF of the product including biogenic emissions. The value must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit. This column can be less than 0.

constantValues: The PCF of the product including biogenic emissions. The value must be calculated with unit kgCO2e per declared unit. This column can be less than 0.

members.name: primarydatashare
members.description: The share of primary data in percent. For recommended business logic, see the Pathfinder Framework.

constantValues: The share of primary data in percent. For recommended business logic, see the Pathfinder Framework.

members.name: productcarbonfootprintassurance
members.description: Assurance information in accordance with the Pathfinder Framework.

constantValues: Assurance information in accordance with the Pathfinder Framework.

members.name: referenceperiodend
members.description: The end of the time boundary for which the PCF value is considered to be representative.

constantValues: The end of the time boundary for which the PCF value is considered to be representative.

members.name: referenceperiodstart
members.description: The start of the time boundary for which the PCF value is considered to be representative.

constantValues: The start of the time boundary for which the PCF value is considered to be representative.

members.name: reliabilitydqr
members.description: DQR based on data quality matrix, scoring reliability of data collected for PCF from weighted average of all inputs >5% of PCF emissions. Must be from 1 to 3, inclusive.

constantValues: DQR based on data quality matrix, scoring reliability of data collected for PCF from weighted average of all inputs >5% of PCF emissions. Must be from 1 to 3, inclusive.

members.name: secondaryemissionfactorsources
members.description: If secondary data was used to calculate the PCF, then it must include this field with value the emission factors used for the PCF calculation. Otherwise, this property must be undefined.

constantValues: If secondary data was used to calculate the PCF, then it must include this field with value the emission factors used for the PCF calculation. Otherwise, this property must be undefined.

members.name: technologicaldqr
members.description: DQR based on data quality matrix, scoring technological representativeness of sources used for PCF from weighted average of all inputs >5% of PCF emissions. Must be from 1 to 3, inclusive.

constantValues: DQR based on data quality matrix, scoring technological representativeness of sources used for PCF from weighted average of all inputs >5% of PCF emissions. Must be from 1 to 3, inclusive.

members.name: temporaldqr
members.description: DQR based on data quality matrix, scoring temporal representativeness of sources used for PCF from weighted average of all inputs >5% of PCF emissions. Must be from 1 to 3, inclusive.

constantValues: DQR based on data quality matrix, scoring temporal representativeness of sources used for PCF from weighted average of all inputs >5% of PCF emissions. Must be from 1 to 3, inclusive.

members.name: uncertaintyassessmentdescription
members.description: If present, the results, key drivers, and a short qualitative description of the uncertainty assessment.

constantValues: If present, the results, key drivers, and a short qualitative description of the uncertainty assessment.

members.name: unitaryproductamount
members.description: The amount of declared units contained within the product to which the PCF is referring to. The value must be strictly greater than 0.

constantValues: The amount of declared units contained within the product to which the PCF is referring to. The value must be strictly greater than 0.

members.name: origincorrelationid
members.description: An optional identifier to correlate record with data origin.

constantValues: An optional identifier to correlate record with data origin.
